titleStmt.title: MELBOURNE CLUB ¶ 19th Sept/87 ¶ Dear Baron von Mueller ¶ ¶ Herewith I enclose you a cheque £10 for the Exploration Fund. Wishing the exploration party every success. ¶ Believe me...

head.supplied: MELBOURNE CLUB ¶ 19th Sept/87 ¶ Dear Baron von Mueller ¶ ¶ Herewith I enclose you a cheque £10 for the Exploration Fund. Wishing the exploration party every success. ¶ Believe me...

div.p: A39 Royal Geographical Society of Australasia (Vic. Branch) papers, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: The signature is uncertain. The correspondent is inferred, based on the name of the donor to the fund listed in the Progress report on the 'Proposed exploration of Central Australia northward and westward from Lake Amadeus' read at the meeting of the Society on 25 November 1887 (Transactions and proceedings of the Royal Geographical Society of Australasia (Victorian Branch) vol. 4, p. 47. No other donor with a similar name is listed.

div.p: Herewith I enclose you a cheque £10 for the Exploration Fund. Wishing the exploration party every success.
